extent: The National Carousel Association was founded in the early 1970's by a group of art historians and collectors, including Frederick Fried, author of the 1964 book "A Pictorial History of The Carousel" that single-handedly gave the classic hand-carved wooden carousel the respect and appreciation it deserved

mentionArg1.extent: a group of art historians and collectors, including Frederick Fried, author of the 1964 book "A Pictorial History of The Carousel" that single-handedly gave the classic hand-carved wooden carousel the respect and appreciation it deserved

Sentence: The National Carousel Association was founded in the early 1970 ' s by a group of art historians and collectors , including Frederick Fried , author of the 1964 book " A Pictorial History of The Carousel " that single-handedly gave the classic hand-carved wooden carousel the respect and appreciation it deserved .

extent: The organization attracted a wide range of members, including carousel enthusiasts, owners/operators, theme and amusement parks, museums, libraries, those in the entertainment/recreation industry, art collectors and even auction houses, among others

extent: amusement park operators
Sentence: The liability insurance crisis further aggravated the situation , as amusement park operators sought to cut their losses , while at the same time liquidate underperforming carousels to raise capital for the purchase of newer and more profitable ( thrill ) rides .

extent: the collectors faction of the NCA

Sentence: The increasing rift between the " preservationists " and " collectors " would eventually boil over into an internal political struggle that caused many in the collectors faction of the NCA to walk out of the group , including founders such as Charlotte Dinger and others .

extent: both factions in the group

extent: Meanwhile, those collectors who left the National Carousel Association banded together to form the American Carousel Society (ACS), whose stated aims of carousel preservation also recognized collectors as a positive asset towards that goal
